texto: evaluating the capability and effectiveness of organizations and processes. This section describes the relationship between ISO/IEC TR 15504 and the major related International Standards. ISO/IEC TR 15504 incorporates the intent of the ISO 9000 series to provide confidence in a supplier's quality management whilst providing acquirers with a framework for assessing whether potential suppliers have the capability to meet their needs. Process assessment provides users with the ability to evaluate process capability on a continuous scale in a comparable and repeatable way, rather than using the pass/fail characteristic of quality audits based on ISO 9001.
